xldoc.name: index
xldoc.title: Galactic Set Theory and applications
xldoc.description: A top level survey of the development of Galactic Set theory and of some applications of that theory.
xldoc.keywords: logic proofpower gst hol set theory functor category pure

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: Galactic Set Theory and some applications. "Galactic" set theory is basically a higher-order set theory in which every set is a member of a "galaxy" and every galaxy is a model of ZFC. (galaxies are what Grothendieck called "universes", which is obviously a misnomer, you can't have more than one universe can you?)
